name: Capri Holdings Limited
description: Capri Holdings Limited is a global fashion luxury group that encompasses a diverse portfolio of iconic brands, including Michael Kors, Versace, and Jimmy Choo. Established in 1981, the company has evolved into a leader in luxury retail, offering a wide range of products including handbags, footwear, apparel, accessories, and fragrances. Capri Holdings is dedicated to creating innovative, high-quality products that resonate with consumers worldwide. The company operates a comprehensive retail network, including flagship stores, department store concessions, and e-commerce platforms, ensuring accessibility to its luxury offerings. Under the leadership of CEO John Idol, Capri Holdings is committed to strategic growth, focusing on expanding its brand presence in key markets and enhancing customer engagement through digital transformation. The company prioritizes sustainability and social responsibility, aiming to reduce its environmental impact and promote ethical practices in its supply chain. Capri Holdings continues to adapt to the evolving fashion landscape, leveraging its strong heritage while embracing modern trends and consumer preferences. With a mission to inspire and empower consumers through luxury fashion, Capri Holdings is well-positioned to navigate the challenges and opportunities of the global luxury market.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
